original_text: And there was a gate on the south of the inner court. And he measured from gate to gate toward the south, a hundred cubits.
korean_text: 안뜰에도 남쪽을 향한 문간이 있는데 그가 남쪽을 향한 그 문간에서 맞은쪽 문간까지 측량하니 백 척이더라

sentences.original_text: And there was a gate on the south of the inner court.
And he measured from gate to gate toward the south
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 남쪽을 향하여 성문에서 성문까지 재었고
